title: Proteomics MultiQC Report pipeline parameters
description: Generate comprehensive quality control reports for mass spectrometry proteomics data using pmultiqc. Based on: Yue et al. (2025) bioRxiv 10.1101/2025.11.02.685980. Repository: https://github.com/bigbio/pmultiqc

plugin_parameters.title: Plugin parameters
plugin_parameters.description: Parameters for the Proteomics MultiQC Report plugin.

affix_type.description: Whether decoy/contaminant identifiers are prefixes or suffixes

condition_column.description: Column name in SDRF file to use for grouping samples into conditions

contaminant_affix.description: Prefix or suffix used to identify contaminant proteins

decoy_affix.description: Prefix or suffix used to identify decoy proteins

disable_table.description: Skip protein/peptide tables for very large datasets to reduce report size

input_directory.description: Directory containing proteomics analysis results. For DIA-NN: must contain report.tsv or report.parquet. For MaxQuant: must contain txt/ folder with results files.

platform.description: Select the proteomics analysis platform used to generate the data

remove_decoy.description: Exclude decoy peptides from identification counts

sdrf_file.description: Optional SDRF (Sample and Data Relationship Format) file to include in analysis
